alert.note: Alert for Interstate 5 Corridor; Western Antelope Valley Foothills; Western San Gabriel Mountains and Highway 14 Corridor (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 01 at 8:54PM PST until December 02 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM PST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Northwest to north winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Interstate 5 Corridor, Western San Gabriel Mountains and Highway 14 Corridor and Western Antelope Valley Foothills. * WHEN...Until 4 AM PST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Interstate 5 Corridor; Western Antelope Valley Foothills; Western San Gabriel Mountains and Highway 14 Corridor
